Description:
Detects the modification of an EC2 snapshot's permissions to enable access from another account

Author: Darin Smith
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: AWS Snapshot Backup Exfiltration
Query: sourcetype='aws-cloudtrail' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'ec2.amazonaws.com' and eventname = 'modifysnapshotattribute'
